text: The Ohio General Assembly is the legislature of Ohio. It has two parts: the Ohio House of Representatives (lower house) and the Ohio Senate (upper house). They both meet at the Ohio Statehouse in Columbus, Ohio. Both houses are currently control by the Republican Party.The Ohio General Assembly Official Government Website, https://www.legislature.ohio.gov/The Ohio House Official Government Website, http://www.ohiohouse.gov/indexThe Ohio Senate Official Government Website, http://ohiosenate.gov/ ==References== Category:State legislatures of the United States Category:Government of Ohio Category:Bicameral legislatures
title: Ohio General Assembly
